about_the_game:
“First contact never ends well for the less advanced civilization.”

In the hundred years since the Galactic Fuchian Empire began its interstellar expansion, it has always been the more advanced civilization. Now, for the first time, the Empire has encountered another spacefaring species on par with theirs. After a disastrous first contact, conflict between the two civilizations seems inevitable. Facing an uncertain future, Kimi, a young cadet in the Empire, must navigate the harsh realities of war.


- Ground and space combat: Fight on foot and command starships against enemies of the Empire.
- Skills and abilities based on equipment: Swap weapons and equipment for abilities that suit your needs, even in the heat of battle!
- Crafting on the go: Collect materials in the field or disassemble unwanted items and use the materials to craft various supplies as needed.
- Gear Customization: Modify your gear with various attachments for extra stats, elements, and even new abilities.
- No random encounters: The majority of combat encounters is represented on the map and can be avoided if you don’t want to fight them.
- Plan ahead: You will never be underleveled or overleveled for fights, so your victory depends on your ability to adapt to your enemies and how prepared you are. You can get minor stat gains and weapon proficiency from battles for an extra edge too.
- Choices matter: Your actions, and inaction, may affect the outcome of the story and lead to bonus rewards, or unexpected consequences.
- Standalone Demo: The demo is a standalone side story that takes place between Chapter 2 and Chapter 3 of the main game. Playing it as well as the main game will give certain events additional context and meaning!


Fuchian Chronicles is a remake of my first game, Space Fox Kimi, which was originally released on Steam in 2018. I have learned a lot about game development since my first release, and wanted to update the game with new graphics, gameplay, and various other improvements before continuing with a sequel. Players who’ve played Space Fox Kimi will notice many similarities in the story with the original, but major story beats have been altered and there will be new plot points as well.

I sincerely hope you enjoy my game, and thank you for supporting me!

content_descriptors.notes: This game tells a fictional war story and as such there are occasional scenes of violence. There will be some blood and dead bodies, but no extreme gore or violence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Interstellar war breaks out between the fox-eared Fuchians and the vile rabbit-like bunnoids, and Kimi, a Fuchian cadet is thrown into the thick of battle. Follow her tale as she fights in ground and space combat in this story driven sci-fi JRPG and shape her fate in with your actions and inaction.
